3: Hey, Nanami! Give me back the fusion device!
I have a new phrase I learned for you! You snooze, you lose! It's mine now!
Ugh... What should we do now?
No, we've got ourselves a party here.
Yeah, I... Enough with the questions! No time to chit-chat! I'm gonna teach them a lesson!
Enough about all the bizarre parts we collected, even the devices in the core were used directly without any treatment.
Well... That's because treating it is a pain in the... Anyway, Nanami, give me a hand!
Okie! Leave it to a super-duper Construct like me!
You form it by... Obviously, not like that!
Oh-no! I'm gonna get torn a new one!
It's... It's not my fault! Kamui's just too strong!
Hey!! Where are you running off to?!
No point crying over spilled milk! It's always hard in the beginning. What's there to be mad about?
